trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There was one other sighting in Springfield on or around June 8th 2012
Summary: Two Blinking lights sequintually next to each other
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend of mine both witnessed this event at wal mart while we were getting ready to enter the store, we witnessed two bright white lights blinking in sequance that they looked as if they may be rotating it had a straight flight path and was moving west east through Springfield, MO. we watched the event for about 5 mins. before the lights just shut off as if someone had turned out the lights on a light switch, the objects made no sound as the flew through the air.
